Egyptian correspondences

𜒔 𓉺 𜑙 𓎨 𜑜 𜑚 𜓒 pu₂ po py pillar pipe beduin 𓌔 bow flute 𓎨 both sides •bhnt 𓉥 𓊁 palace
𜒔 𜒕 𜒖 𜒗 𜐸 𜐹 peculiar : 𜐳 𜐴 𜒕 𜒖 𜒗 𜐸 𜐹 𐊽 K₂ 𜏌 continuum !

ثُعْبَان ṯuʿbān Thuban 𓆑 (snake) ⇔ tube tubus tuba tībia (pipe) ?

𓄤 𓏤 | heart and wind-pipe | => 𓎛 𓏏 𓏏 𓄈 | windpipe, throat | ה.throat 𓎛 𓏏 𓏏 𓄈||windpipe, throat| hroat ⇔ hals
